credit_line: Museum purchase from Trustees' Book Appropriation
dimensions: H: 8 x W: 29 x L: 45.5 cm
title: Theorie
medium: Medium: paper, bound with cardboard covered with vellum, containing fabric samples and mises-en-carte
description: Book written in delicate longhand, title page labelled: "Theorie" and signed, "Louis Delaroche, 1860".  Contains 130 samples of fabrics, 68 mises-en-carte and numerous schematic sketches for needle arrangement and descriptions of fabrics and their technical analysis.
name: Weaver's thesis book
